name: Ali Ahmed-Jan
personality: Hussein is a quiet and reserved individual, but always follows orders without question.
story: Hussein grew up in a small village in Iran, where he learned how to use a rifle at a young age. When he turned 18, he joined the Iranian Army and served for 10 years before defecting to the OPFOR. He is loyal to his new comrades and is willing to do whatever it takes to accomplish his mission.
